00024 #ifndef __mqtt_message_h
00025 #define __mqtt_message_h
00026 
00027 extern "C" {
00028     #include "MQTTAsync.h"
00029 }
00030 
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <memory>
00033 #include <stdexcept> 
00034 
00035 namespace mqtt {
00036 
00038 
00044 class message
00045 {
00047     MQTTAsync_message msg_;
00048 
00050     friend class async_client;
00051 
00056     void set_duplicate(bool dup) { msg_.dup = (dup) ? (!0) : 0; }
00062     void copy_payload(const void* payload, size_t len);
00063 
00064 public:
00068     typedef std::shared_ptr<message> ptr_t;
00073     message();
00078     message(const void* payload, size_t len);
00083     message(const std::string& payload);
00087     message(const MQTTAsync_message& msg);
00091     message(const message& other);
00095     message(message&& other);
00099     ~message();
00105     message& operator=(const message& rhs);
00111     message& operator=(message&& rhs);
00115     void clear_payload();
00119     std::string get_payload() const;
00124     int get_qos() const { return msg_.qos; }
00130     bool is_duplicate() const { return msg_.dup != 0; }
00136     bool is_retained() const { return msg_.retained != 0; }
00140     void set_payload(const void* payload, size_t n);
00144     void set_payload(const std::string& payload);
00150     void set_qos(int qos) throw(std::invalid_argument) {
00151         validate_qos(qos); 
00152         msg_.qos = qos;
00153     }
00159     void set_retained(bool retained) { msg_.retained = (retained) ? (!0) : 0; }
00164     std::string to_str() const { return get_payload(); }
00170     static void validate_qos(int qos) throw(std::invalid_argument) {
00171         if (qos < 0 || qos > 2)
00172             throw std::invalid_argument("QOS invalid");
00173     }
00174 };

00176 typedef message::ptr_t message_ptr;
